statement: The main claim made by the original study.
hypothesis: A testable hypothesis based on the claim.
model: The model used to replicate the focal claim
coefficients: Which coefficient(s) are used to validate the claim
original_coefficients: Value of the coefficients to validate the claim from the original paper
original_p_value: p-value of the statistical significance test from the original paper
replicated_coefficients: Value of the coefficients from the replication outputs
replicated_p_value: p-value of the statistical significance test from the replication outputs
conclusion: Conclude whether the claim from the original paper has been successfully replicated.
